# eneRgyVD

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the application (packaged under {eneRgyVD}) is to provide communes and citizens of Canton de Vaud with energy statistics through an accessible and documented plateform. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of eneRgyVD like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("mick-weber/eneRgyVD")

```

## Launching the app locally

After installing, you can call `library(eneRgyVD)` and then simply run `run_app()` to launch the app on a local instance.
